quest.name: From Now until Affinity
journal:
Lisette would inform you of another event taking place alongside the Valentione's Ceremony.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

With her usual irrepressible enthusiasm, Lisette informs you that the fortune-tellers from the previous year's celebration are back to offer couples a glimpse of their future together. If you wish to avail yourself of their services, form a party with one other adventurer and go before each of them in turn.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
You and your chosen partner now know your potential for great riches, grand adventure, and genuine love. Time to report back to Lisette, who will be eager to hear how you fared.

Lisette reminds you that, whether the outlook is promising or no, it is not the be-all and end-all. What matters most is taking your first step on the long journey of love.
...Of course, if you so wish it, you can always ask Lisette for another telling of your fortune.
objectives: Form a party of two and speak with the fortune-tellers.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: My dear adventurer! I saw what you did for my sister Astrid, and we of House Valentione are most thankful for your intervention!

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: I was somewhat concerned about her lack of experience, but I see she is warming to her role quite nicely. I think you'll agree the ceremony is safe in her adorable little hands.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: As such, mayhap you can now spend a moment or two in service of your own entertainment. I, myself, am in charge of an event that many find endlessly enthralling...

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: The telling of fortunes! We have three seers of exceptional senses stationed right outside the amphitheatre, ready to unveil the myriad threads of your destiny.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: Does that not sound exciting!? Do you not yearn to hear the whispers of what the morrow might bring!?

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: You and your chosen partner need but present yourselves before these practiced prophets, and in mere moments you shall know your affinity with one another, be it in adventure, wealth, or romance.

dialogue.name: HORTEFENSE
dialogue.text: Pray forgive my interruption, my lady, but should we not apprise this gentlewomangentleman of the rumored deceiver?

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: My stars! The thought had completely slipped my mind. Heed me well, adventurer, and ware you the false speaker of fortune who peddles her baseless predictions alongside our sayers of sooth!

dialogue.name: HORTEFENSE
dialogue.text: This charlatan works without the accreditation of the academy. Thus if you encounter one who foresees suspicious futures, then I implore you to ignore her words.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: That said, I shall let our fortune-tellers know that you will be calling. A mere formality, to be sure─they have already foreseen your coming. And for another formality, pray report to me afterwards, yes?

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: Desire another glimpse at your future, do you? With a different partner, mayhap? Tee hee!

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: Very well, I shall let our fortune-tellers know that you will be calling.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To have your fortune told, you must form a party of two with another adventurer.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: Remember to take your partner with you when going before the fortune-tellers, and pray report to me afterwards, yes?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To have your fortune told, you must form a party of two with another adventurer.

dialogue.name: HORTEFENSE
dialogue.text: Be certain you speak with one of our fortune-tellers, my ladylord, and ware the charlatan preying upon the sore of heart.

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Ah, another couple wants to know if riches lie in their future. A wise choice, for rare indeed is the bond that can bear the weight of an empty coinpurse.

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: See here, I only specialize in telling the fortunes of couples. Bring one other, be it your lover or your friend, and I shall gladly tell you what treasure awaits in your future.

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Well, let us see here... My ladylord is registered to the Adventurers' Guild in [Starting City]?

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: And your partner...born in this moon? Yes... Is the path you are destined to walk paved with gold, or will you end up on the street begging for coin? The cards shall reveal all!

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: The winds of fortune favor you two! They blow at your back, guiding you to the waters of La Noscea. With fishing poles in hand, go forth secure in the knowledge that your hooks shall not remain empty for long!

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: And if you are not yet avid anglers, now is the time to acquaint yourselves with a new hobby! But don't just go out in any old rags. Fortune often favors the fashionable. Honey yellowRose pinkSylph green...aye, you are guaranteed a healthy catch with garbs dyed just so.

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Fortune smiles down upon you! Take advantage of this rare blessing, and venture deep into the woods. Bring your sharpest axes, and fate shall guide you to stout trunks fit for the realm's most luxurious wares.

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: A lucrative logging career shall provide a sturdy foundation for your future endeavors. But don't forget the importance of appearances; a fledgling lumberjack must stand out against herhis drab peers. Yes... Rose pinkSylph greenHoney yellow garb shall benefit you both within the forests and without.

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: A fortuitous reading indeed! Fate beckons you to arid desertssandy shoresverdant forests, pickaxes in hand. There lie rocky outcroppings full to bursting with the earth's bounty.

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Go there, and you shall be rewarded with riches most precious! But you must not go as you are and hope to succeed, oh no. Venture forth garbed in sylph greenhoney yellowrose pink, and the earth shall give over its gifts even more readily.

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: The cards say chance is your most dependable ally! It would behoove you not to ignore this rare blessing. Board an airship bound for the Gold Saucer at once!

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: The denizens of the Saucer shall flock to you, drawn by the riches you gain from games of luck. But, alas, not if you go wearing that. No, fortune shall favor only those dressed in a glamorous getup of raisin brownmesa redmeadow green.

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: The winds of fortune blow languidly, but at least they do not blow against you. In the waters of Thanalan, fish swim to and fro, hungry for their next meal. It is there you should go if you wish for a chance at a profitable endeavor.

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Fill your stomachs with fish caught by your own hands, and contentment at a job well done shall be your reward. Your luck may not be the best, but if you cast your lures wearing coeurl yellowmarsh greenrusset brown, then your fortunes may improve.

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Hmmm... It seems the path to riches may be rather more taxing than you might have hoped. In the dense forests of La Noscea, stout trees await those with the patience to saw through their broad trunks.

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Now may be the time to replace your dull wooden furnishings and tools with brand new ones, and take pleasure in the satisfaction hard work brings. What small luck you have in your endeavors may be augmented by an outfit of marsh greenrusset browncoeurl yellow.

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Hmmm... It seems wealth shall only come to you after grueling work. Go deep within the Black Shroud, to where rocks burst with valuable minerals, waiting for a pair of pickaxes to pry them from the earth.

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Bedeck yourself in precious metals and gemstones plucked from the soil with your own hands. And what's this? The earth may be more generous with its gifts if you mined wearing an outfit colored russet browncoeurl yellowmarsh green.

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Hmmm... You may not be swimming in gold, but neither shall you want for wealth. It may be in your best interests to take a direct approach to riches. With a treasure map to guide you, hunt for wealth long forgotten.

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Although after many long and fruitless hours your hope may wane, if you persevere, fortune will see fit to reward you. And what's more, your luck will be much improved if you set out wearing attire colored apple greenbone whitemoss green.

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Oh my. This is not good, not good at all. To be blunt, your luck has run out. Bring your fishing poles to the Black Shroud and wait out this spell of bad luck. Whether you catch fish or not is irrelevant; it is most crucial that you avoid any risky endeavors.

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: But beware as well the fish that bite at your lure. Not all taste the same, and an unappetizing catch may make an already bad day worse. Still, there are some measures you can take to mitigate your misfortune. An outfit of cream yellowbark brownsalmon pink may serve to keep the worst of it at bay.

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Oh dear. It seems fortune has forsaken you. It might be best to indulge in a hobby and wait for this unlucky period to end. Logging, perhaps? Yes... Thanalan would be the perfect place. Lose yourself in the gentle whispers of the desert breeze, until fortune sees fit to smile upon you once more.

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: However, I would give a wide berth to anything wrought from wood in the meantime, lest a broken chair result in flushed cheeks and a sore arse. Luckily, you need not live in abject fear of misfortune. Keep yourselves dutifully wrapped in clothes of bark brownsalmon pinkcream yellow, and you may be spared fate's worst barbs.

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Ah... I would not count on fortune to be your ally for the time being. In fact, it may be best to take refuge in the routine, until this run of bad luck comes to an end. The mining in La Noscea is said to be grand this time of year. Yes, busy hands will keep you from inviting hazard.

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: But take special care of any precious stones you may own. In a moment, a gem may slip loose from its setting, never to be seen again. However, it may be possible for you to mitigate fate's cruelty. Clothe yourselves in finery of cream yellowbark brownsalmon pink, and perhaps the most unhappy circumstances will pass you by.

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Oh no... It seems lean times are ahead of you. Even a treasure map, no matter how detailed, would bring you little more than dirt and a sore back. It's best to give up on any dreams of easy riches for now. You have to be realistic about these things, you know.

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Guildleves, however, are just the thing for those who do not─or cannot─rely on luck. Honest pay for honest work. I suggest keeping your pockets filled with those until this unfortunate spell passes. And just to be safe, make sure you conduct the guildleves in attire colored lime greenhunter greenolive green, or else even those might end in failure.

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Ah... Misfortune shall follow at your heels for some time. At all costs, stay away from the gaudy lights of the Gold Saucer! If you step foot into that playground of chance, then all of your hard-earned coin will vanish in a flash, leaving you with scant enough to take the airship back in shame.

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: No, no, that will not do. However, if the allure of the Gold Saucer is too much to bear, at least be content to gaze at it from a distance, your coinpurse far from its grasp. Perhaps if you were wrapped in clothes the color of hunter greenolive greenlime green, it might afford you some strength to resist your impulses.

dialogue.name: TREASURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Should you wish another fortune told, my colleagues are skilled at reading the signs from the spheres of high adventure and rapturous romance.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: So a pair of adventurers wishes to know if they are destined for song and celebration? It is this very question that my cards will answer, if you so desire.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: A lone adventurer lives a life bereft of companionship. What interest is there in knowing that? Return to me once you've found another.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Ah, such eagerness! Well then, let us begin! Hmmm...aan HyuranElezenLalafellinMiqo'teRoegadynAuriHrothgarViera [Job], are you?

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: And your partner? Yes...your fate is materializing before me. Are you destined for greatness, or will your names be lost to history? Look, and we shall see!

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Oh my, you are a pair destined for glory indeed! Remain steadfast at each other's side, and they will tell tales of your deeds at the tables of admirals, Seedseers, and sultanas alike! The blessings of Llymlaen shall guide you to riches and renown.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: The Navigator bids you heed an envoy from beyond the seas to the East. Listen well, and soon shall you embark upon the first of many adventures to be remembered far and wide!

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Ah, one of the Twelve looks favorably upon this pairing! Nald'thal beams down from the heavens. All misfortune you have suffered will be eclipsed by the magnitude of the glory that lies ahead of you.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Nald'thal's smile beckons you beneath the earth. Seek out a land of entangled aether, and your search shall lead you to adventures most grand!

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Ah, one of the Twelve has taken a liking to this pairing! None other than the venerable Halone has granted you Her fury. Any obstacles obstructing your journeys shall crumble before Her might.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: All the signs bid you venture unto the heavens themselves. The great winged beast which soars through the skies will carry you towards glory and honor!

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Ah, you have won the favor of one of the Twelve! The wise Thaliak shall bring harmony to your endeavors together. Even your most difficult tribulations shall serve only to build an unshakable bond between you.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Avail yourself of Thaliak's blessing and journey to the mysterious lands of the Far East. There shall beasts of surprising sagacity offer the potential for unforgettable adventure.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: One of the Twelve smiles down upon you two! You are fortunate enough to have won the goodwill of Nymeia Herself! Nary a beast can withstand the combined might of this partnership with Her blessing safeguarding you.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: After you have weathered countless trials, your path shall lead you to a weapon of unsurpassed power. With it, you shall fight your way into the annals of Eorzean legend!

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: While not the most heartening outlook, there is no cause for despair. The solitary islands of the Sea of Clouds hold much promise for grand adventure. But beware, for if you drop your guard for even an instant, you may risk losing everything you have worked for.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: It may be best to beseech the Twelve for protection. Go to the mark of the Navigator in Limsa Lominsa, and entreat Llymlaen for Her guidance. To ensure Her blessing's efficacy, carry a fish─alive or dead─with you at all times during your journey.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Hmmm...Azeyma's scales remain level, showing neither favor nor disdain. The omens point to a great adventure on a newly discovered island. Alas, you cannot hope to succeed in this endeavor without each other's full trust.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Before you depart, journey to the mark of the Dusk Trader in Ul'dah, and beseech Nald'thal to tip the scales ever so slightly to your advantage. During your trials, always carry a precious gem on your person, as a symbol of His blessing.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Byregot Himself works to build a solid foundation for your partnership. Opportunity for glory lies in the east, but the road to obtain it is harsh and ashen. Weather the wastes, however, and the suffering will pale in comparison to the ecstasy of triumph.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Before you set off, beseech Halone for aid at the mark of the Fury in the Coerthas central highlands. Make sure always to carry a spear in your hands during your journey, and Her blessing is assured.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: You have the reassurance of Nophica that the storms of hardship you are facing will only serve to nourish your future renown. I sense within the ruins of Sharlayan lie the seeds of adventure most thrilling, but only through concerted effort shall they bear any fruit.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: The gods can offer you further aid, if you but ask. Go to the mark of the Scholar in Mor Dhona, and beseech Thaliak to grant you the wisdom to choose the most favorable path. Keep a shellfish close at hand during your journeys, and the Twelve will not forsake you.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: To see a pair so loyal to each other makes Menphina Herself smile. Set out on a journey to forge a weapon worthy of song, and as the moon waxes, so too shall your work come to fruition.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Surely a journey of creation is worthy of the Builder's blessing as well. Wielding a golden hammer to please the gods, visit the mark of the Builder deep within the Black Shroud and beseech Byregot to lend His steady hand to your work.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: This result is...unfortunate. It seems Llymlaen has turned Her eyes from you. Embark to the seas and you shall be met with only languid winds and clouded skies.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: It would not be wise to journey across the waters, but you may seek the blessing of another of the Twelve. Journey to La Noscea and pray before the mark of the Wanderer, so that at the very least you shall have Oschon's blessing on the land.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Azeyma's scales are weighted against you, and She judges you harshly. Nald'thal has forsaken you, and to venture underground would mean facing the myriad dangers of the earth.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Your only chance to reverse this misfortune is to go to Thanalan and entreat the Twelve for mercy before the mark of the Warden. Only then may Azeyma's scales shift in your favor. In the meantime, it is best to stay above ground, safe under the protection of the sun and sky.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Oh my... Through affronts known only to Him, you have earned Rhalgr's wrath. Halone is unwilling to protect you from Her father's ire. Beware a gathering in Ala Mhigo, for your adventures will surely meet with tragedy.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Your only recourse is to request the blessing of another. Journey to Coerthas and pray before the mark of the Lover, and perhaps Menphina's tenderness will assuage Rhalgr's anger. For the present, make safety and security a priority, and do not take reckless risks.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Ah, it seems you two have become pawns in one of Althyk's inscrutable plots. Thaliak is loath to entangle Himself in such a precarious situation, and any endeavors you have planned in Sharlayan will be steeped in danger.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: The only hope to wrest free from Althyk's machinations is to rely on the aid of another. Go to La Noscea and make your devotions before the mark of the Spinner, so that Nymeia's blessing may improve your fate. For the time being, however, it would be best to ensure each other's safety, avoiding dangerous battles at all costs.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Halone has chosen to test you two, and Byregot dares not interfere with His sister's plans. If you had hoped to build, or craft, be prepared to toil for longer than is reasonable.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Only one path remains to you if you wish to improve your standing in the eyes of the Twelve. Go to the mark of the Destroyer in Thanalan, and beseech Rhalgr to put a stop to His children's games. Until that time, proceed with caution, and do not let your impatience get the best of you.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURELUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Have you listened at the feet of my fellow fortune-tellers? Once you have received a full set of divinations, I believe Lady Lisette would love to hear from you!

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Another couple comes wishing to know if love can bloom between them. Well, 'tis why I am here! But be forewarned: I am but a servant of fate, and my words may not be what you hope to hear. Knowing that, do you still wish for me to divine your affinity for ardor and affection?

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: I don't see a partner with you. Do you expect me to tell you if you love yourself? No, no, that is entirely too dull. Come again with another, and I shall tell you what blossoms between you, be it love or...something else.

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: You answer without hesitation! I sense great confidence in your partnership! Hmmm... Let's see here. You were born in the First Astral MoonFirst Umbral MoonSecond Astral MoonSecond Umbral MoonThird Astral MoonThird Umbral MoonFourth Astral MoonFourth Umbral MoonFifth Astral MoonFifth Umbral MoonSixth Astral MoonSixth Umbral Moon, and thus your fate is guided by HaloneMenphinaThaliakNymeiaLlymlaenOschonByregotRhalgrAzeymaNald'thalNophicaAlthyk.

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: And your partner's nameday is? Yes... The threads of fate are coming together. Behold, the cards reveal a couple's fate!

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: You two are a match made by the Twelve! Your partner truly feels they can trust you with anything.Your unshakable devotion fills your partner with the courage to overcome the most trying of difficulties.In the heat of battle there is no one else your partner would want at their back.Your partner praises the Twelve daily for their luck to have you by their side.You take your partner's breath away.Your partner feels safe even during their most vulnerable moments.Your partner feels completely at ease with you.Your relationship runs much deeper than just adventuring.You bring out the very best in your partner.The bonds you share are even thicker than blood and more lasting than stone.There is nary a truer and more loyal partnership than yours.Your partner feels safe and secure in your embrace. Alas, even the most passionate relationship can benefit from a bit of variety.

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Everyone loves to see their partner looking their best from time to time. During their next nameday, why not show off your most fashionable HyuranElezenLalafellinMiqo'teRoegadynAuriHrothgarViera outfit? It just might be the spark that brings you two even closer together.

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: No two adventurers are more meant for each other than you! Your partner praises the Twelve daily for their luck to have you by their side.You take your partner's breath away.Your partner feels safe even during their most vulnerable moments.Your partner feels completely at ease with you.Your relationship runs much deeper than just adventuring.You bring out the very best in your partner.The bonds you share are even thicker than blood and more lasting than stone.There is nary a truer and more loyal partnership than yours.Your partner feels safe and secure in your embrace.Your partner truly feels they can trust you with anything.Your unshakable devotion fills your partner with the courage to overcome the most trying of difficulties.In the heat of battle there is no one else your partner would want at their back. Alas, even the most promising relationship must be treated with care.

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: The honey muffintomato piedark pretzelmeat miq'abobstuffed cabbagegrilled dodofiller is a traditional staple of HyuranElezenLalafellinMiqo'teRoegadynAuriHrothgarViera cuisine, correct? Surely a sample of such a splendid dish would show your partner how much they are appreciated. All that's required is the smallest amount of effort, and you two shall never stray from each other's sides!

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: The stars must have been aligned when they brought this pair together! Your partner feels completely at ease with you.Your relationship runs much deeper than just adventuring.You bring out the very best in your partner.The bonds you share are even thicker than blood and more lasting than stone.There is nary a truer and more loyal partnership than yours.Your partner feels safe and secure in your embrace.Your partner truly feels they can trust you with anything.Your unshakable devotion fills your partner with the courage to overcome the most trying of difficulties.In the heat of battle there is no one else your partner would want at their back.Your partner praises the Twelve daily for their luck to have you by their side.You take your partner's breath away.Your partner feels safe even during their most vulnerable moments. But remember, there is more to life than adventuring. A private moment together can do much to enrich your relationship.

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: You hail from [Starting City], correct? It may serve you both well to share a relaxing stroll alone through the Anchor YardApkallu Fallsthe Gold Court. There you shall be able to lose yourselves in each other's gazes and whisper many sweet nothings.

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: You two are destined to be together! The bonds you share are even thicker than blood and more lasting than stone.There is nary a truer and more loyal partnership than yours.Your partner feels safe and secure in your embrace.Your partner truly feels they can trust you with anything.Your unshakable devotion fills your partner with the courage to overcome the most trying of difficulties.In the heat of battle there is no one else your partner would want at their back.Your partner praises the Twelve daily for their luck to have you by their side.You take your partner's breath away.Your partner feels safe even during their most vulnerable moments.Your partner feels completely at ease with you.Your relationship runs much deeper than just adventuring.You bring out the very best in your partner. But sometimes you must remind people of your devotion.

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Use your particular set of skills as an [Job]a [Job] to lift up your partner both within the battlefield and without. Take care not to be lax in your duties, for a match such as this comes only once an era.

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: The gods themselves are envious of your affinity for each other! There is nary a truer and more loyal partnership than yours.Your partner feels safe and secure in your embrace.Your partner truly feels they can trust you with anything.Your unshakable devotion fills your partner with the courage to overcome the most trying of difficulties.In the heat of battle there is no one else your partner would want at their back.Your partner praises the Twelve daily for their luck to have you by their side.You take your partner's breath away.Your partner feels safe even during their most vulnerable moments.Your partner feels completely at ease with you.Your relationship runs much deeper than just adventuring.With you your partner feels they can be their most true self.The bonds you share are even thicker than blood and more lasting than stone. But without growth even the most spirited relationship can become stagnant.

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Strive always to be the womanman your partner deserves, and through mutual effort you will both be enriched by this relationship. Do not forget the passion of your first meeting, and make sure each moment together is just as ardent as that one.

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Ah... It seems there is still work to be done between you. Your partner views you as a competent ally, but little more.Your partner still feels slightly timid around you.Your partner seems reluctant to talk with you of their troubles.Your partner has not opened up completely to you yet.Your company is welcome, but not essential.Your relationship seems to be based purely on convenience.There is still some distance between you and your partner.Your partner has little interest in you outside of pleasantries.The bonds between you are not as strong as they could be.Your partner is utterly unimpressed by you.If your partner saw you in a crowd, they would only greet you with a wave.Your partner acknowledges your existence, but only for as long as they need to. But do not despair, for relations can change for the better, and with but a little effort you may yet win the heart of your desired!

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Remember that being attentive to your partner's needs is essential. Even if they do not say it, there is likely much they are struggling with. Pay attention, and your partner will notice.

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Now, pray do not be alarmed, but the stars show no particular favor to you two. Your partner views you as a competent ally, but little more.Your partner still feels slightly timid around you.Your partner seems reluctant to talk with you of their troubles.Your partner has not opened up completely to you yet.Your company is welcome, but not essential.Your relationship seems to be based purely on convenience.There is still some distance between you and your partner.Your partner has little interest in you outside of pleasantries.The bonds between you are not as strong as they could be.Your partner is utterly unimpressed by you.If your partner saw you in a crowd, they would only greet you with a wave.Your partner acknowledges your existence, but only for as long as they need to. But you need not despair, for this fate is not set in stone.

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Even the most hardened adventurers like to look their best from time to time. To celebrate your partner's nameday, present to them a heartfelt gift─a necklace, ring, or earrings─that shows the depth of your gratitude for their companionship. Before long, the lukewarm nature of your companionship may grow into something worthy of celebration!

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Ah... It seems there is something to be desired between you two. Your partner views you as a competent ally, but little more.Your partner still feels slightly timid around you.Your partner seems reluctant to talk with you of their troubles.Your partner has not opened up completely to you yet.Your company is welcome, but not essential.Your relationship seems to be based purely on convenience.There is still some distance between you and your partner.Your partner has little interest in you outside of pleasantries.The bonds between you are not as strong as they could be.Your partner is utterly unimpressed by you.If your partner saw you in a crowd, they would only greet you with a wave.Your partner acknowledges your existence, but only for as long as they need to. But there is still hope! Even the most frigid heart can be warmed by a homemade meal.

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: The key to a fruitful relationship lies in the kitchen. Treat your partner to a sweet rolanberry cheesecakesachertortefig bavarois, and they won't soon forget your generosity. But remember, this gesture is but the first of many that will be required to make your relationship blossom.

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: The cards say the relationship between you is...somewhat tepid. Your partner views you as a competent ally, but little more.Your partner still feels slightly timid around you.Your partner seems reluctant to talk with you of their troubles.Your partner has not opened up completely to you yet.Your company is welcome, but not essential.Your relationship seems to be based purely on convenience.There is still some distance between you and your partner.Your partner has little interest in you outside of pleasantries.The bonds between you are not as strong as they could be.Your partner is utterly unimpressed by you.If your partner saw you in a crowd, they would only greet you with a wave.Your partner acknowledges your existence, but only for as long as they need to. Mayhap you have forgotten that there is more to a friendship than just nodding silently in agreement to each other.

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: You hail from [Starting City], correct? Sit down with your partner at the BismarckBuscarron's Druthersthe Coffer & Coffin, and over a bottle or two of your preferred libations, have a lively conversation and become more well acquainted with each other.

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Oh my. Truth be told, I've not made a reading this unfavorable in some time. You are a thorn in your partner's side.Your partner is looking for the first opportunity they have to abandon you.It is only a matter of time before you have daggers at each other's throats.Your partner has no interest in getting on well with you at all.It is a wonder your partner can even bear to be standing next to you right now, in fact.Your partner would rather spend their time cleaning the chocobo stables than spend another moment in your company.Your partner can hardly bear to make eye contact with you without being overcome with disgust.Spending time with you is the single most exhausting part of your partner's day.Your partner views you with as much interest as they would an insect.Your partner has regretted every second since they paired with you.Your partner silently wishes that you won't make it back from each adventure.Your partner hates so much about the things that you choose to be. Suffice it to say, I suggest you end this partnership at once! Ah, but you have a look about you that says you refuse to give up. Well, if you must be so stubborn...

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Sit down with your partner and have a frank discussion about all that you've endured together. Mayhap then you shall find out what caused this rift between you. Be aware, however, that the road to reconciliation may be longer and more arduous than is worth it.

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Oh my. Your outlook is bleak, to say the least. You are a thorn in your partner's side.Your partner is looking for the first opportunity they have to abandon you.It is only a matter of time before you have daggers at each other's throats.Your partner has no interest in getting on well with you at all.It is a wonder your partner can even bear to be standing next to you right now, in fact.Your partner would rather spend their time cleaning the chocobo stables than spend another moment in your company.Your partner can hardly bear to make eye contact with you without being overcome with disgust.Spending time with you is the single most exhausting part of your partner's day.Your partner views you with as much interest as they would an insect.Your partner has regretted every second since they paired with you.Your partner silently wishes that you won't make it back from each adventure.Your partner hates so much about the things that you choose to be. Hmmm... 'Tis a dark fate indeed. However, the situation isn't entirely hopeless.

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Reflect upon how you've conducted yourself lately, and if you are honest with yourself, you may find much that needs improvement. If you value your partner's presence, take heed of their opinions as well and listen carefully to their point of view.

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Ah... It pains me to say I must be the bearer of bad news. You are a thorn in your partner's side.Your partner is looking for the first opportunity they have to abandon you.It is only a matter of time before you have daggers at each other's throats.Your partner has no interest in getting on well with you at all.It is a wonder your partner can even bear to be standing next to you right now, in fact.Your partner would rather spend their time cleaning the chocobo stables than spend another moment in your company.Your partner can hardly bear to make eye contact with you without being overcome with disgust.Spending time with you is the single most exhausting part of your partner's day.Your partner views you with as much interest as they would an insect.Your partner has regretted every second since they paired with you.Your partner silently wishes that you won't make it back from each adventure.Your partner hates so much about the things that you choose to be. The spark of passion that once existed between you has been extinguished, likely some time ago. Yet there may be a way to rekindle it.

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Gather your oldest and most trusted allies, and venture into the Sastasha Seagrotthe Tam-Tara DeepcroftCopperbell Mines. Retracing the paths of your past exploits may serve to remind you both of what drew you together in the first place.

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Steel your heart, for you may not want to hear this. You are a thorn in your partner's side.Your partner is looking for the first opportunity they have to abandon you.It is only a matter of time before you have daggers at each other's throats.Your partner has no interest in getting on well with you at all.It is a wonder your partner can even bear to be standing next to you right now, in fact.Your partner would rather spend their time cleaning the chocobo stables than spend another moment in your company.Your partner can hardly bear to make eye contact with you without being overcome with disgust.Spending time with you is the single most exhausting part of your partner's day.Your partner views you with as much interest as they would an insect.Your partner has regretted every second since they paired with you.Your partner silently wishes that you won't make it back from each adventure.Your partner hates so much about the things that you choose to be. The situation looks dire, but pray do not be hasty in ending this partnership.

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: You must also ask yourself: Have I been setting my best foot forward as an [Job]a [Job]? Be honest─and harsh─with your answers, and seek out the candid opinions of others as well. Strive to improve on your shortcomings and mayhap your partner may notice the effort you put into bettering yourself.

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: This reading is...not good. Not good at all. You are a thorn in your partner's side.Your partner is looking for the first opportunity they have to abandon you.It is only a matter of time before you have daggers at each other's throats.Your partner has no interest in getting on well with you at all.It is a wonder your partner can even bear to be standing next to you right now, in fact.Your partner would rather spend their time cleaning the chocobo stables than spend another moment in your company.Your partner can hardly bear to make eye contact with you without being overcome with disgust.Spending time with you is the single most exhausting part of your partner's day.Your partner views you with as much interest as they would an insect.Your partner has regretted every second since they paired with you.Your partner silently wishes that you won't make it back from each adventure.Your partner hates so much about the things that you choose to be. It seems you two have forgotten what brought you together in the first place.

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Go to where the adventure started. [Starting City], was it? The Drowning WenchThe Carline CanopyThe Quicksand is home to many fresh-faced adventurers in need of advice and aid. As a team, lend them a helping hand, and their bright-eyed gratitude may serve to remind you of the reasons you became partners so long ago.

dialogue.name: COMPATIBILITYLUCKTELLER03206
dialogue.text: Have you received readings from we fortune-tellers three? Romance is the obvious aspect, but matters of coin and courage can just as easily sway the balance of a relationship!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You cannot proceed. One or more party members are too far away.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To have your fortune told, you must form a party of two with another adventurer.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: Ah, if that isn't the look of a womanman who has glimpsed herhis future. Was the path ahead smooth and gilded with gold? Or was the road cracked and lacking in luster?

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: Whether the outlook is promising or no, pray remember that it is not the be-all and end-all.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: As is the case with the Valentione's Ceremony, these fortunes are but a means to spur love on its way. For indeed love has a long way to journey, and the most important step is the first.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: ...Of course, if you so wish it, you can always have your fortune told again. You need but let me know. After all, there is no shame in the pursuit of love eternal and true!

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: Ah, if that isn't the look of a womanman who has glimpsed herhis future. Remember, whether the outlook is promising or no, it is not the be-all and end-all. The most important thing is to take your first steps together.
